suppliers.Name: Pacific Resort Rarotonga
suppliers.Description: A luxury resort located on the beachfront of Muri Lagoon, offering world-class amenities and accommodations.

suppliers.Name: Trader Jacks
suppliers.Description: A popular beachfront restaurant and bar known for its lively atmosphere and delicious seafood.

suppliers.Name: The Mooring Fish Café
suppliers.Description: A charming café located by the beach, famous for its fresh fish sandwiches and casual dining experience.

suppliers.Name: Tikioki Marine Reserve
suppliers.Description: A marine protected area ideal for snorkeling and diving to explore vibrant coral reefs and marine life.

suppliers.Name: Charlie’s Café and Beach Hire
suppliers.Description: A cozy café offering delicious local dishes, as well as beach equipment rentals for a fun day out.

suppliers.Name: Vaima Polynesian Restaurant
suppliers.Description: A fine dining restaurant serving traditional Polynesian cuisine with a modern twist.

suppliers.Name: Cook Islands Cultural Village
suppliers.Description: An interactive cultural experience offering guided tours and performances showcasing Cook Islands traditions.

suppliers.Name: Highland Paradise Cultural Centre
suppliers.Description: A cultural centre offering authentic Polynesian shows and traditional feasts.

suppliers.Name: Muri Beach Club Hotel
suppliers.Description: A boutique hotel located on Muri Beach, providing luxurious accommodations and stunning lagoon views.

suppliers.Name: Rarotonga Airport Shuttle Service
suppliers.Description: Reliable and convenient airport shuttle service offering transfers to and from Rarotonga International Airport.

suppliers.Name: Aitutaki Lagoon Day Trip
suppliers.Description: A day trip to Aitutaki Lagoon, known for its crystal-clear waters and stunning island scenery.

suppliers.Name: Rarotonga Car Rentals
suppliers.Description: A car rental service offering a range of vehicles to explore the island at your own pace.

suppliers.Name: Muri Beach Cottages
suppliers.Description: Cozy beachfront cottages located on Muri Beach, perfect for a relaxing getaway.

suppliers.Name: Island Night Show at Te Vara Nui
suppliers.Description: A spectacular island night show featuring traditional dance, music, and a feast.
